title: "Robot dog locates and destroys fire ants"
excerpt: "To enable the quadruped robot to detect and eliminate fire ants — which can cause serious harm and disrupt food chains — the team trained an open-source artificial intelligence (AI) system on fire ant nest images taken from different angles and under various environmental conditions."
